name: Makarov PM
description: The Pistolet Makarova was developed by the Soviet Union to replace the WWII-era TT-33 pistol.  Uses the 9x18mm cartridge, which remains in use among various former Soviet countries.
//: 10 and 12-round magazines exist, but were made for the newer PMM, might not be compatible with the old PM.

name: Skorpion Vz. 82
description: A version of the Skorpion submachine gun chambered in 9x18mm Makarov, with a slightly longer barrel than the origional design.
